Post._content:
Git  GitHub  SSH SSH key`Github`C `something`  `something.pub`  `something`  `id_dsa`  `id_rsa` `.pub` 

<!--more-->

## 1. Git 

gitgithub

```java
git config --global user.name "lillusory" //
git config --global user.email "xueduanli@163.com"  //
```

## 2. SSH key

### 2.1 

- `ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "" `  ssh key
- C
- 

SSH keygithub

### 2.2 SSH key

![](https://github.com/illusorycloud/illusorycloud.github.io/raw/hexo/myImages/git/2018-12-27-git-ssh-key-set1.png)

![](https://github.com/illusorycloud/illusorycloud.github.io/raw/hexo/myImages/git/2018-12-27-git-ssh-key-set2.png)



Github-->-->Settings-->SSH and GPG keys-->SSh keysNew SSH keys-->name key

C`C:\Users\13452\.ssh`

 `id_rsa``id_rsa.pub` 

`id_rsa.pub`key, `ssh-rsa`

### 2.3 

`ssh -T git@github.com`

```yes`



> Hi xxx! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not # provide shell access.

RSS - 1. - Git`npm install --save hexo-generator-feed`,, `node_modules`. - 2.`` - ,_config.yml`,: ```yml # Extensions ## Plugins: http://hexo.io/plugins/ plugins: hexo-generate-feed ``` - 3.`` - `_config.yml`,`rss` :`rss: /atom.xml` ### 5. next. - next,`canvas-nest` `canvas-nest: true`, ```yml # Canvas-nest # Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nest canvas_nest: enable: true onmobile: true # display on mobile or not color: '0,0,255' # RGB values, use ',' to separate opacity: 0.5 # the opacity of line: 0~1 zIndex: -1 # z-index property of the background count: 99 # the number of lines ``` theme/next `git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nest source/lib/canvas-nest ` - ```yml # JavaScript 3D library. # Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-three # three_waves three_waves: false # canvas_lines canvas_lines: false # canvas_sphere canvas_sphere: false ``` 1. theme/next 2. `git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-three source/lib/three` **4,** ### 6. logo `themes/next/source/images` ``_config.yml,`favicon:` ```yml favicon: small: /images/favicon-16x16-next.png medium: /images/favicon-32x32-next.png apple_touch_icon: /images/apple-touch-icon-next.png safari_pinned_tab: /images/logo.svg ``` ### 7. `themes/next/source/js/src` love.js, ```javascript !function(e,t,a){function n(){c(".heart{width: 10px;height: 10px;position: fixed;background: #f00;transform: rotate(45deg);-webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);-moz-transform: rotate(45deg);}.heart:after,.heart:before{content: '';width: inherit;height: inherit;background: inherit;border-radius: 50%;-webkit-border-radius: 50%;-moz-border-radius: 50%;position: fixed;}.heart:after{top: -5px;}.heart:before{left: -5px;}"),o(),r()}function r(){for(var e=0;e ``` ### 8. `themes\next\source\css\_common\components\post\post.styl`css ```css // .post-body p a{ color: #0593d3; border-bottom: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #0593d3; &:hover { color: #fc6423; border-bottom: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #fc6423; } } ``` ### 9. `next\layout\_partials\head`: ```html ``` ### 10. `\themes\next\layout\_macro``page-end-tag.swig`, ```html
{% if not is_index %}
------------------------------------
{% endif %}
``` `\themes\next\layout\_macro\post.swig``post-body``post-footer` ```html
{% if not is_index %} {% include 'page-end-tag.swig' %} {% endif %}
``` `_config.yml`), ```yml # page_end_tag: enabled: true ``` ### 11. Hexohtml,,. `hexo-neat` - - `npm install hexo-neat --save` - `` - ```yml # hexo-neat # neat_enable: true # html neat_html: enable: true exclude: # css min.css neat_css: enable: true exclude: - '**/*.min.css' # js min.js neat_js: enable: true mangle: true output: compress: exclude: - '**/*.min.js' - '**/jquery.fancybox.pack.js' - '**/index.js' - '**/love.js' # ``` - 3. - `hexo g` ### 12. `\themes\next\source\css\_custom\custom.styl`, ```js // .post { margin-top: 60px; margin-bottom: 60px; padding: 25px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 203, .5); -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 204, .5); } ``` ### 13. `/themes/next/layout/_macro/post.swig``rel="tag">#` `# `,tag, ```html {{ tag.name }} ``` ### 14. 1.`GitBash` `hexo-wordcoun`t: ```java npm install hexo-symbols-count-time --save ``` 2.`_config.yml`: ```yml symbols_count_time: symbols: true time: true total_symbols: true total_time: true ``` 3.`_config.yml`: ```yml # symbols_count_time: separated_meta: true item_text_post: true item_text_total: true awl: 4 wpm: 275 ``` , ### 15. ``,`creative_commons` ```yml # Creative Commons 4.0 International License. # https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-types-examples # Available: by | by-nc | by-nc-nd | by-nc-sa | by-nd | by-sa | zero creative_commons: #License license: by-nc-sa # sidebar: false # post: true ``` ### 16. `node_modules/hexo-generator-index/lib/generator.js`, ```js 'use strict'; var pagination = require('hexo-pagination'); module.exports = function(locals){ var config = this.config; var posts = locals.posts; posts.data = posts.data.sort(function(a, b) { if(a.top && b.top) { // top if(a.top == b.top) return b.date - a.date; // top else return b.top - a.top; // top } else if(a.top && !b.top) { // toptop233 return -1; } else if(!a.top && b.top) { return 1; } else return b.date - a.date; // }); var paginationDir = config.pagination_dir || 'page'; return pagination('', posts, { perPage: config.index_generator.per_page, layout: ['index', 'archive'], format: paginationDir + '/%d/', data: { __index: true } }); }; ``` ,top,. ```md tag: hexo copyright: true password: xxx top: 150 ``` ### 17. **Next** `` ```yml busuanzi_count: enable: true total_visitors: true total_visitors_icon: user total_views: true total_views_icon: eye post_views: true post_views_icon: eye ``` `enable``false``true`. ,. ### 18. 1. `npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save` 2.`` ```yml search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 ``` 3.`` ```yml # Local search # Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-generator-searchdb local_search: enable: enable # if auto, trigger search by changing input # if manual, trigger search by pressing enter key or search button trigger: auto # show top n results per article, show all results by setting to -1 top_n_per_article: 1 # unescape html strings to the readable one unescape: false ``` ### TODO //TODO ### [Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/) [Next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)

var pagination = require('hexo-pagination'); module.exports = function(locals){ var config = this.config; var posts = locals.posts; posts.data = posts.data.sort(function(a, b) { if(a.top && b.top) { // top if(a.top == b.top) return b.date - a.date; // top else return b.top - a.top; // top } else if(a.top && !b.top) { // toptop233 return -1; } else if(!a.top && b.top) { return 1; } else return b.date - a.date; // }); var paginationDir = config.pagination_dir || 'page'; return pagination('', posts, { perPage: config.index_generator.per_page, layout: ['index', 'archive'], format: paginationDir + '/%d/', data: { __index: true } }); }; ``` ,top,. ```md tag: hexo copyright: true password: xxx top: 150 ``` ### 17. **Next** `` ```yml busuanzi_count: enable: true total_visitors: true total_visitors_icon: user total_views: true total_views_icon: eye post_views: true post_views_icon: eye ``` `enable``false``true`. ,. ### 18. 1. `npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save` 2.`` ```yml search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 ``` 3.`` ```yml # Local search # Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-generator-searchdb local_search: enable: enable # if auto, trigger search by changing input # if manual, trigger search by pressing enter key or search button trigger: auto # show top n results per article, show all results by setting to -1 top_n_per_article: 1 # unescape html strings to the readable one unescape: false ``` ### TODO //TODO ### [Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/) [Next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)
